high_descs: Pick up the blue pillow from the bed.
Make a right, walk forward, then hang a left to reach the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a blue pillow under a lit lamp.

high_descs: pick up the mouse pan from the left side of the table
take the pad to the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: look at a mouse pad at the lamp

high_descs: Pick up the blue pillow from the bed.
Turn right and walk to the end of the bed then turn left and walk to the window, then turn right to face the lamp on the corner of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow under the light of a lamp.
